author: Simon Difford
description: Most sour renditions are strictly solo spirit-based, but why be so constricting when you can have a threesome? I like to let scotch have its way over the other two participants as this seems to help the trio sit harmoniously with the citrus and rich almond sugar. There's no need for block ice or other niceties – it's not that kind of trio.
name: Trader Vic's Sour
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
3 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
